result.reason: This feature allows users to establish arbitrary tunnels before initiating a connection, enhancing flexibility and security.
result.approach: Implement new configuration options for arbitrary tunnels within connection objects, extend the connection establishment process to initiate configured tunnels before the main connection, and introduce new UI elements for tunnel management.
